ActCorrections and Conditional Release Act
PrecisAppointment of SYLVIE N. BLANCHET of Dieppe, New Brunswick, to be a full-time member of the Parole Board of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a period of five years; and her designation as the Executive Vice-Chairperson of the Parole Board of Canada, effective January 3, 2018.
